General.Name: Nubeva Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Nubeva Technologies Ltd. develops and licenses software-based decryption solutions and TLS (SSL) network decryption solutions. It engages in the provision of cloud-based security software and services, as well as professional services. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in San Jose, California.
General.Address: 333 West San Carlos Street, San Jose, CA, United States, 95110
